title: Mathematical Expression Transformation Project: Converting Linguistic Expressions to Graphs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of fundamental function concepts, graph interpretation skills, and conversion between mathematical representations
context.additional_context: Project-based learning using smartphone-based collaboration tools for learners requiring linguistic problem-solving skills linked to real-world professional contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately transform linguistic problem situations into mathematical graphs
Learners can analyze and improve their transformation processes through think-aloud protocols
Learners can submit final graph solutions incorporating peer feedback through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
